author: Hemant Mehta
title: Watch Matt Dillahunty Talk About How Atheists Should Respond to Biblical Contradictions
text:
« Creationist Ken Ham Will Permanently Illuminate Ark Encounter in Rainbow Colors. Because God. About Hemant Mehta 
Hemant Mehta is the editor of Friendly Atheist, appears on the Atheist Voice channel on YouTube, and co-hosts the uniquely-named Friendly Atheist Podcast . You can read much more about him here .
